blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Si éteint il faut allumer avant de chois: If off, turn on before choosing a color
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Il faut valider l'appairage en appuyant: You must confirm the pairing by pressing the button
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Capteurs de Température Humidité avec éc: Humidity Temperature Sensors with e-ink screen
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Le relachement est envoyé même après un: The release is sent even after a single press or double press
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Obligatoire pour tenter expérimentalemen: Mandatory to experimentally experiment with direct color access
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Il est recommandé d'utiliser l'option ga: It is recommended to use the keep connection option
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Peut être détecté à la place d'un autre: Can be detected instead of another playbulb if it is the case change in the drop-down menu
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Portée capricieuse, qui peut justifier u: Capricious reach, which can justify a slightly long processing of actions
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Visible que sur appui du bouton (peut fo: Visible only on pressing the button (can operate via a frame hack to recover the key) but will not be done because illegal
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Attention si le bracelet est connecté à: Attention if the bracelet is connected to your smartphone it is more visible in bluetooth
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Selon les firmwares peut ne plus fonctio: According to firmwares may no longer work
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Ne doit absolument pas être connecté sur: Must not be connected to another device at all
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Uniquement pour de la présence (le reste: Only for presence (the rest will come)
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.La connection se fait dès que le bouton: The connection is made as soon as the button is visible within 20 seconds (this is confirmed by stopping the flashing) and that only on the antenna chosen in transmission (in this case it is obviously necessary to choose the same in reception and transmission)
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Attention pour que le bouton fonctionne: Attention for the button to work, check keep the connection, from that moment the connection is kept and the button is no longer visible from other antennas
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Ne doit pas rester connecté en permanenc: Must not stay permanently connected on your phone if you want interaction in Jeedom
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Fonctionnera beaucoup mieux avec option: Will work much better with keep connection option
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Fonction garder la connection obligatoir: Function keep the connection compulsory to not have the bluetooth logo
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Uniquement pour les équipements non enco: Only for equipment not yet added in the plugin, to at least have the presence and rssi as well as the raw data
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Il faut activer le mode bluetooth pour u: You must activate the bluetooth mode to use the commands
blea\/equipement.compatible.md.Cette liste est basee sur des retours ut: This list is based on user feedback, the Jeedom team cannot therefore guarantee that all the modules in this list are 100% functional.
